name: Expand Your World
description:
In "Expand Your World" you free your small world from the darkness and expand it by interacting with objects of the world in an adventure-game-esque way.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 38 in significantly less than 48 hours. That's why it's kind of lacking in the content-departement.

Oops: I left in my little cheats... Keys 1 through 5 and enter can be used to unlock certain parts of the world (or everything in the case of enter)

Make sure to check out the game on Ludum Dare and vote if you can!

Tools used for making this game


  • LÖVE as the game engine
  • bfxr and Bosca Ceoil for sounds
